list_of_reviews.review_title: My crypto account was locked after my…
list_of_reviews.review: My crypto account was locked after my coin surged. I have not been able to get in the account and they have been lying and giving me the run around now I have made a complaint to sec, better business bureau along with the ftc. They intentionally are acting malicious and showing fraudulent behavior. I would like to know how many more has experienced something like this so we can start a Class Action against Crypto com

Terrible terrible terrible!! Save your money and your mental health, because this app and business are completely useless. For 2 months I couldn't resolve simple issues with support they were useless, it's going 3rd month now and I still have the same problem. USELESS! I still hold money on that account and if you care about your money, take it out ASAP and forget about his bloody app.

Very bad customer service, appalling.  lost my debit card in February 24, asked for a replacement which I was told would be with me in a few days. It is now 11 weeks and I’ve still not received my debit card. This is disgusting disgraceful service and please avoid these people👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

If I could give lower than 1 star I would. Crypto is touted as tranforming the financial services industry but these people are not a step in the right direction. The whole system works around holding of CRO and they use that token to cash out to pay for marketing and internal costs. My CRO went from A$1 to $0.10 and during the crypto recovery when bitcoin went ATH the CRO token barely whimpered as they cashed in. These are the worst group of people in the Crypto industry yet to be prosecuted. Dont. DONT DONT!! use this platform. I am not against Crypto but these people are snakes by any other name.

list_of_reviews.review_title: By far the worst customer service…
list_of_reviews.review: By far the worst customer service experience I have ever had with any company. Awful to work with. Customer service is completely inept and unable to resolve even the most simple concerns. I cannot think of a company that I have grown to despise more. They are the worst. Do yourself a favor and avoid them at all costs!!!

Complete and utter garbage .....avoid these clowns. Will not accept a government issued photo ID or internet, phone and telephone bill as proof of residence despite all of them containing my name, address and ID number and took 4 days to tell me this.....

There are no custom service, no response on any mails. I moved app from old device and I can not get in anymore. And nobody answer on my e-mails for a month. Company is not deserved even 1 star for attitude.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Fiat account pending for over a month, 16 hours spent with one customer support member with no progress made
list_of_reviews.review: I've tried to open a Fiat account with crypto.com, after sending the documents they asked, it's been pending for over a month. I spent 16 hours with the customer support chat. After the first 4 hours they tell me that they will open a ticket for me. Proceeds to tell me to wait, 12 hours later I don't even have a ticket number to refer to, the next customer support person has taken over the same chat (I replied to them via email) and still has no clue what this is about. They proceed to tell me to continue waiting.
My merchant business account will not allow me to withdraw any funds, I have sent numerous emails, but no reply. I would not recommend anyone to use this company in any way.

I have used a few different platforms and I have to say.....this was a reasonably good experience.  Purchasing the products was easy.  Moving them off the exchange was even easier than expected.  Only significant room for improvement I would suggest is the user experience of the platform.  It's kind of clunky and not that intuitive or streamlined.  It's certainly not pretty.  But it worked for me.  Also, compared to other platforms...I thought the fees were alright. I will use the platform again.

Absolutely terrible service. I moved from Australia to Uk and they wouldn’t let me change my tel no so 9 weeks later I am still in theProcess of having my ID verified, which never happens. Every time you contact them to chase they pretend to not know what is happening. It’s exhausting. Coinbase dealt with the same issue within 24 hours, crypto.com are a complete scam.

Extremely disappointed. Benn use the car. Don't long time. Some way now is freez.  And. Nobody can answer phone call emails  or. Nothing  Extremely bad bad service  better. To go. With. Binance  or any other wallet

Was putting little bits in the account but then when I wanted to take it out they told me it’s the law I have to put money in their account with a bank transfer to remove my money. I wish I had seen this trust pilot score before using them!

A so called Crypto.com broker reached out to me about investing. After much trepidation and research it looked legit and I was in a tight spot so I took a chance. All looked well and after 6 months it was time to make a withdrawal. I was first told it would take $6,000 to cover the taxes and then told they had made a mistake and it would be $10,000, I called them out as scammers and turned it over to the FBI. Avoid Crypto.com, Will Howe and CoinMarketCap at all costs.

This company is the worst, they have stolen some money from my Visa debit card and keep passing me from one person to the next, it has taken over two weeks and i have spoke to over 10 people and it still hasnt be resolved. AVOID AT ALL COSTS. They are scam artists.
Use coinbase, cheaper and a much better app.plenty of support on coinbase and easy to withdrawal. No support on crypto.com and higher fees

Been on crypto.com for over 2 years now and they now email me saying they cant offer me a service anymore and I need to remove my assets as they say due to regularity nonsense!!!!! Use a different exchange is my advice!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Fees are way too high when you sell
list_of_reviews.review: Fees are way too high when you sell. You pay $5 for every $40 you try sell. Way above average. Wont be investing more on this platform

Customer Service is Poor, it is very complicated to get to someone and the Live support is difficult to find. I didn't feel safe that I could remove funds quickly and would not recommend this company or platform.As you can see no replies to customer complaints so I would steer clear of these guys.

list_of_reviews.review_title: So far great company and platform.
list_of_reviews.review: So far this company has been awesome. I have had no issue so far. I’ve been seeing a pattern where most of these 1 stars are people who have fallen for a scam. I have been scammed as well before and definitely feel their frustrations. However blaming a company because someone outside the company scammed you is low. It’s like giving McDonalds a 1 star because you bought a McChicken and someone else took it from your hands and started eating it.

Old account locked after changing country of residence. Nothing works to restore access. Customer support answers emails formally, not caring at all, without giving any real attention and providing useless suggestions. Chat support does not exist.Registering new account seems to be impossible too. Silly authorisation mistakes upon log-in. No suggestions from their comments at Google Play, by email, or chat — have worked. I am amazed at the level of ineffectiveness and stupidity of the customer support in this company. I am giving up to restore access or re-register.

list_of_reviews.review_title: chatted with FINLEE from chat support…
list_of_reviews.review: chatted with FINLEE from chat support ,no one wantsand no one cares to assist me with my fiat deposit i made and its been more 24 hours!!! They dont even want to send me my money back to my bank account ! !!!Rubbish service from chat support ! DO NOT USE CRYPTO.COM !!!!FOR FUTURE REFERENCE DO NOT USE CRYPTO.COM

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security is good but options are risky with high minimums except for instant trade
list_of_reviews.review: Difficult to transfer assets into but definitely more secure than coinbase Plus deposits go through instantly so no worry about getting account locked over something dumb also if you enable reroll on strike trading you're likely to lose the whole investment and there's no option to lock it so you have to manually turn it off every time if you don't whatever you invest will likely lose a digit or two so proceed with caution they're advanced trading options or lackluster and and require high minimums

Just prefer any other platformI am using the app for 5 years now and since day 1 all they win is negativity. I am moving my funds a little at a time for more that a year now. A week ago my CRO was unlocked after the 6 month period for the card, and they "staked" it for me so i can't get it. Now i have to wait another month+ to be able to withdraw and they say "you accepted the T&C we have". When i asked them where they say in the T&C that they can stake my CRO without my consent, they just stop responding to the chat.Just avoid them, use other platforms to have your mind at peace

list_of_reviews.review_title: You make gains on your investments and…
list_of_reviews.review: You make gains on your investments and it states your balance..then when you go to withdraw it all of a sudden your balance you want to withdraw has gone down by like £80-£100....lost loads of money because of this. Don't believe the balance they show you because when you go to sell you seem to lose a stupid amount! What's the point in investing when crypto.com takes majority of it when you sell.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The assistance is very poor, fees are high.
list_of_reviews.review: The assistance is very poor and doesn't give you satisfying anwers. It happened often that the operator is not able to help me and he/she had to ask his "relevant staff", with the promise to give me an answer. After many days of silence I have to recontact them, with the same epilogue. That happened many times.I have found big security issues. My visa debit card (always kept safe and not using it a lot, almost never online) was emptied by some hackers (180 € more or less). After more than 3 weeks I still don't have my money back or a new card to use it (I don't even know if they have shipped it or not. They have not been able to give me a precise answer about it).The app doesn't work well: you can't find your old conversations with the support, and if you close a conversation and no one have given you a new answer, you are not able to load it anymore and you have to reopen a new one from the beginning. Terrible.Fees are quite high and not very clear or transparent.So far, not a good experience. I don't recommend it.

Terrible terrible terrible!! Save your money and your mental health, because this app and business are completely useless. For 2 months I couldn't resolve simple issues with support they were useless, it's going 3rd month now and I still have the same problem. USELESS! I still hold money on that account and if you care about your money, take it out ASAP and forget about his bloody app.

They intentionally are acting malicious and showing fraudulent behavior. I would like to know how many more has experienced something like this so we can start a Class Action against Crypto com

list_of_reviews.review_title: Crypto froze access to my account 7…
list_of_reviews.review: Crypto froze access to my account 7 months ago for a random check . Since then it has been like a gaming task of hoops to jump through and tests , never the same person answers more than once and always ask you to start again . Finally completed the tasks only to be told to make a security video that even with the help of two IT professionals have not found a way to send the video it’s like I have completed the tasks and they say to themselves - this guy is getting close to restating his account let’s block his video so he can’t get his money back . Customer service is appalling nobody cares . I would tell anyone never use this company you can kiss your money good bye and they don’t care . The video is 54 meg and they say they can take up to 100. It claims there is a link on their set up page to send it - not there . They told me to close the app and reset up which I did - it didn’t work and the person who told me to do it doesn’t now answer my emails - 7 months of hell . Don’t use them .

Completely ignored by customer support and delays upon delays mean i have lost a lot of money from being forced to wait to withdraw my money. Absolutely unprofessional and borderline scamming. I will be considering legal action if i am not given a proper response and timeframe.

Very bad customer service, appalling.  lost my debit card in February 24, asked for a replacement which I was told would be with me in a few days. It is now 11 weeks and I’ve still not received my debit card. This is disgusting disgraceful service and please avoid these people👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible app with sky high fees
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible app with sky high fees. Completely unsuitable for day trading. Made £100 gains and wanted to sell but they say they will take £80 out of that. What is the point. I won’t be surprised if they will be asked to stop trading in the UK and other countries soon.  Customer support are bots and any real person can’t give you a proper answer. Fees are hidden in the spread, BEWARE!!!

These guys are crooks.The app looks very nice and fancy and the products and contracts they offer are very lucrative. Alas....Just when I was making the best trade I've had, I wanted to exit the contract but the app WOULDN'T LET ME. No matter how many times I tried, It kept saying "network error, please try again." Everything else in the app was live and well so it definitely was NOT a network problem. Is it a coincidence that just when I was making good money that all of a sudden we have network errors that wouldn't let me sell the contract? I cleared the app's cache, restarted it, nothing worked. Eventually, after an hour or two, the contract went the other way until it was blown up and I went from nice profits to very ugly losses. These kinds of things should NEVER happen on a trading platform! So far they didn't bother to respond to my email about the incident, but I smell fraud from miles away. I lost trust in them.

I have used a few different platforms and I have to say.....this was a reasonably good experience.  Purchasing the products was easy.  Moving them off the exchange was even easier than expected.  Only significant room for improvement I would suggest is the user experience of the platform.  It's kind of clunky and not that intuitive or streamlined.  It's certainly not pretty.  But it worked for me.  Also, compared to other platforms...I thought the fees were alright. I will use the platform again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: By far the worst customer service…
list_of_reviews.review: By far the worst customer service experience I have ever had with any company. Awful to work with. Customer service is completely inept and unable to resolve even the most simple concerns. I cannot think of a company that I have grown to despise more. They are the worst. Do yourself a favor and avoid them at all costs!!!

If I could give lower than 1 star I would. Crypto is touted as tranforming the financial services industry but these people are not a step in the right direction. The whole system works around holding of CRO and they use that token to cash out to pay for marketing and internal costs. My CRO went from A$1 to $0.10 and during the crypto recovery when bitcoin went ATH the CRO token barely whimpered as they cashed in. These are the worst group of people in the Crypto industry yet to be prosecuted. Dont. DONT DONT!! use this platform. I am not against Crypto but these people are snakes by any other name.

My merchant business account will not allow me to withdraw any funds, I have sent numerous emails, but no reply. I would not recommend anyone to use this company in any way.On Friday 26th April I received an email stating someone will look at my account, I will update later to see if they do anything.

Keep away from this "financial institute". Its CEO is (most probably) Sam Bankman-Fried. If you put your money there you will never see it again. I tried to withdraw my money and they told me to  make 2 deposits. I made the deposits, they sent the money back. So I was stuck in this infinite loop. Then they told me to buy their card and use the money. Their must be made by AI. Artificial Imbeciles. Who will tell their client to spend their money in order to have it back? So the other imbecile here did what they told. So, all of a sudden they decided to freeze my card. I went to the app to try to unfreeze it and the app told me to get in touch. Again, how can an institution be so incompetent? I opened the chat and after a while I talked to someone who resembled a human being. After explaining my case 3 times she or he or they or ze told me to call a specialist. Wait. Who was I talking to then? A trained monkey?So here I am, two hours later waiting for someone with half a brain to solve my MISTERY OF THE IMPOSSIBLE TO UNFREEZE CARRRDDD.

Complete and utter garbage .....avoid these clowns. Will not accept a government issued photo ID or internet, phone and telephone bill as proof of residence despite all of them containing my name, address and ID number and took 4 days to tell me this.....

list_of_reviews.review_title: So far great company and platform.
list_of_reviews.review: So far this company has been awesome. I have had no issue so far. I’ve been seeing a pattern where most of these 1 stars are people who have fallen for a scam. I have been scammed as well before and definitely feel their frustrations. However blaming a company because someone outside the company scammed you is low. list_of_reviews.review: Amazing service, it's easy to put money in using several bank partners!They have minuses also - support NEVER responds. Please fix it guys!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Honestly wouldn’t even give them 1 star…
list_of_reviews.review: Honestly wouldn’t even give them 1 star but this website makes you sooo. But first of the app is impossible to navigate so many pop ups and different tabs. They deliberately make the option of selling crypto and withdrawing impossible. The fees are dumb high. And please don’t get me started on the customer service. I feel like I would have gotten better customer service from a toddler. The customer service reps quite literally know nothing and don’t even make an attempt to assist you. Just “sorry for the inconvenience. I hope this issue gets resolved.” Like you’re the one that’s supposed to help me resolve it. Don’t waste your time calling them either. Very poorly ran company. They’re are definitely not in it for the customers

list_of_reviews.review_title: So I tried to pay a vendor $45 in…
list_of_reviews.review: So I tried to pay a vendor $45 in bitcoin. I opened an account at crypto.com and, after a couple of days of verification I finally got an account.  I deposited over $50 to cover costs and attempted to pay the vendor. I was informed that you cannot pay anything under $100 You can deposit under $100 but don't expect to do anything with itSo. I transferred the bitcoin back to cash, paying the fee and tried to withdraw.  Ahh, you cannot withdraw under $100.So, I deposited another $52 so that I had over $100 to withdraw which the company lost. I am now 2 weeks in and 7 separate support chats with  "special teams" to find my deposit.  I should mention that I have spent over 5 hours with this inept companyDo not use these guys !!!
Unbonding 29 days, wish they had warned me first.Not worth the effort, they have invested everywhere with our hard earned cash. But not rewards.RUN, take your cash and run.

I tried to sign up and I wanted to move from Binance to Crypto.com but after 3 months and over 50 emails sent and received from customer service, they are still not able to activate my account. What a shame. I have never seen such bad service.Suggestion: use another crypto dashboard/wallet

list_of_reviews.review_title: Honestly wouldn’t even give them 1 star…
list_of_reviews.review: Honestly wouldn’t even give them 1 star but this website makes you sooo. But first of the app is impossible to navigate so many pop ups and different tabs. They deliberately make the option of selling crypto and withdrawing impossible. The fees are dumb high. And please don’t get me started on the customer service. I feel like I would have gotten better customer service from a toddler. The customer service reps quite literally know nothing and don’t even make an attempt to assist you. Just “sorry for the inconvenience. I hope this issue gets resolved.” Like you’re the one that’s supposed to help me resolve it. Don’t waste your time calling them either. Very poorly ran company. They’re are definitely not in it for the customers
Worst platform ever. Never seen such bullcrap in one platform. You can deposit money on app no problem really easy. When it comes to withdraw? Good luck if you're in Europe. YOU CAN'T. Trash app.

list_of_reviews.review_title: So I tried to pay a vendor $45 in…
list_of_reviews.review: So I tried to pay a vendor $45 in bitcoin. I opened an account at crypto.com and, after a couple of days of verification I finally got an account.  I deposited over $50 to cover costs and attempted to pay the vendor. I was informed that you cannot pay anything under $100 You can deposit under $100 but don't expect to do anything with itSo. I transferred the bitcoin back to cash, paying the fee and tried to withdraw.  Ahh, you cannot withdraw under $100.So, I deposited another $52 so that I had over $100 to withdraw which the company lost. I am now 2 weeks in and 7 separate support chats with  "special teams" to find my deposit.  I should mention that I have spent over 5 hours with this inept companyDo not use these guys !!!

Old account locked after changing country of residence. Nothing works to restore access. Customer support answers emails formally, not caring at all, without giving any real attention and providing useless suggestions. Chat support does not exist.Registering new account seems to be impossible too. Silly authorisation mistakes upon log-in. No suggestions from their comments at Google Play, by email, or chat — have worked. I am amazed at the level of ineffectiveness and stupidity of the customer support in this company. I am giving up to restore access or re-register.

I tried to sign up and I wanted to move from Binance to Crypto.com but after 3 months and over 50 emails sent and received from customer service, they are still not able to activate my account. What a shame. I have never seen such bad service.Suggestion: use another crypto dashboard/wallet
Unbonding 29 days, wish they had warned me first.Not worth the effort, they have invested everywhere with our hard earned cash. But not rewards.RUN, take your cash and run.

they blocked my account without any reason, I sent an email several times, but they replied just a template email that they would respond to you in some days, their chat support is the same, a robot with any help, they blocked an old account that you can not withdraw your money or transfer any fiat or crypto. and I wonder why there is no authority that we can make a legal complaint to them.

I have used a few different platforms and I have to say.....this was a reasonably good experience.  Purchasing the products was easy.  Moving them off the exchange was even easier than expected.  Only significant room for improvement I would suggest is the user experience of the platform.  It's kind of clunky and not that intuitive or streamlined.  It's certainly not pretty.  But it worked for me.  Also, compared to other platforms...I thought the fees were alright. I will use the platform again.

list_of_reviews.review_title: You make gains on your investments and…
list_of_reviews.review: You make gains on your investments and it states your balance..then when you go to withdraw it all of a sudden your balance you want to withdraw has gone down by like £80-£100....lost loads of money because of this. Don't believe the balance they show you because when you go to sell you seem to lose a stupid amount! What's the point in investing when crypto.com takes majority of it when you sell.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Security is good but options are risky with high minimums except for instant trade
list_of_reviews.review: Difficult to transfer assets into but definitely more secure than coinbase Plus deposits go through instantly so no worry about getting account locked over something dumb also if you enable reroll on strike trading you're likely to lose the whole investment and there's no option to lock it so you have to manually turn it off every time if you don't whatever you invest will likely lose a digit or two so proceed with caution they're advanced trading options or lackluster and and require high minimums

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible app with sky high fees
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible app with sky high fees. Completely unsuitable for day trading. Made £100 gains and wanted to sell but they say they will take £80 out of that. What is the point. I won’t be surprised if they will be asked to stop trading in the UK and other countries soon.  Customer support are bots and any real person can’t give you a proper answer. Fees are hidden in the spread, BEWARE!!!

Very bad customer service, appalling.  lost my debit card in February 24, asked for a replacement which I was told would be with me in a few days. It is now 11 weeks and I’ve still not received my debit card. This is disgusting disgraceful service and please avoid these people👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

Completely ignored by customer support and delays upon delays mean i have lost a lot of money from being forced to wait to withdraw my money. Absolutely unprofessional and borderline scamming. I will be considering legal action if i am not given a proper response and timeframe.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The assistance is very poor, fees are high.
list_of_reviews.review: The assistance is very poor and doesn't give you satisfying anwers. It happened often that the operator is not able to help me and he/she had to ask his "relevant staff", with the promise to give me an answer. After many days of silence I have to recontact them, with the same epilogue. That happened many times.I have found big security issues. My visa debit card (always kept safe and not using it a lot, almost never online) was emptied by some hackers (180 € more or less). After more than 3 weeks I still don't have my money back or a new card to use it (I don't even know if they have shipped it or not. They have not been able to give me a precise answer about it).The app doesn't work well: you can't find your old conversations with the support, and if you close a conversation and no one have given you a new answer, you are not able to load it anymore and you have to reopen a new one from the beginning. Terrible.Fees are quite high and not very clear or transparent.So far, not a good experience. I don't recommend it.

list_of_reviews.review_title: By far the worst customer service…
list_of_reviews.review: By far the worst customer service experience I have ever had with any company. Awful to work with. Do yourself a favor and avoid them at all costs!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: half of your issues are irrelevant
list_of_reviews.review: I've used this for almost a year now, and had no real issues.. both with using my crypto card (have had two different cards) and with sending funds to other wallets. im sure many of the issues mentioned here are real, and clearly they need to invest in (human) customer support- but details like network fees (just stick with Solana), gas fees, lockup times, the importance of correct chain choice between wallets - there are online tutorials, and prices are mentioned in the terms and other places online, it's not unique to cryptocom, it's not a scam, it's a business model. but some of you seem to be complaining about real scams, "first you call me and sell me this app, with too many adds and then you took my money" doesn't sound like the actual crypto.com. fees aren't scams, the one you just paid made some graph jump, that's pretty much the game. Research the difference between btc/eth/sol-chains before you pick one for juggling money. I would much rather pay a slightly higher fixed instaprice for coins and hold a month than to mettle around with "trade orders" in the other apps myself. i stick with .com and phantom mostly. i really like the design, even though the graphs seem warped (why is 2021 taking up so much space?) and I would really love a candle option... to the guy giving one star because he can't figure out google authenticator, proudly spamming them with 200 emails about it: how about just googling it? YouTube it. You can't "demand" a phonecall because you can't figure out 2way authentication, you're blocking CS to people with real issues. one star because it's not available in your country yet, that's great "one star because they ask for ID when I want to change my phone number, it's been days" relax, that's a good thing. an actual human is processing your document. it shouldn't be easy to change your phone number. ...clearly, there are real issues they need to figure out, plus some millions spent on customer support would help this app rocket past some competitors. For the rest of us, maybe they could launch a tutorial video with a mandatory pop-quiz before people are allowed to register, and thereby get more informed reviews and receive relevant frustrations only.. now press the motorcycle if you understand that we will sit on your first $50 for a month. Crypto.com is here to help you digitalize and hopefully grow your assets- consider figuring out how to spend your profits digitally instead of stressing about the time or costs for transferring tiny amounts back to old banks in random countries (with their own fees) on day 3. if u fear red, or fumble and panic, sell to USDC to "pause" it until you understand, instead of spamming the withdrawal button. the crypto visacard will connect to googlepay and most online servicesthe AI bot everyone hates could refer to a part.com partcommunity driven discord server for platonic technical questions. sorry this got super lengthy, best of luck the future is blockchained #8000

Crypto.com is a fraudulent company.Ran very much like a gangster operation, but without the kneecapping (yet). They bend over backwards to take your money and convert it to cryptocurrencies, but charge exorbitant transfer fees and outright refuse to convert crypto back into fiat currency. They effectively take your hard-earned assets and keep them for themselves. I hope this helps warn potential new victi...sorry, customers away from making the grave mistake of having anything to do with this fraud operation.

Almost all countries around the globe are not eligible.But they are promoting this thing as a BIG DEAL without leave clear for all, wich citizens are really eligibles. As result of this FAKE, i blocked the founds to get thats benefits wich never comes. then i contact them and they send me a link with a list of the jurisdictions eligible and not eligible.

Crypto.com had several shady business practices that made the overall experience a bad one dealing in at least Crypto.Firstly deposits are easy as expected, but there are are few things that help maximize their income fees for new users and make selling/withdrawls difficult like making us monkeys jump through hoops in the hopes we give up and forfeit our money closing our accounts.I bought Crypto and eventually decided to sell it. What caught me off guard was that you could not sell direct to a wallet and could only transfer to another crypto currency (which results in fees) by default. After working with support for several weeks, they claimed this on a caching issue, I finally got an agent that said I needed to set up my currency for this "fiat wallet' and even though I had set my currency when I setup my account, I needed to do it again in this fiat wallet or it wasn't even selectable during the sell crypto process. This process by the way, was also difficult to get started. This resulted in mistakes trying to sell into other crypto currency for them to collect more fees. Why not just call it a wallet or "my cash" and why hide it also behind a name like fiat wallet. Additionally why block it behind another verification of funds to use when I had already chosen my default currency when I signed up.Extracting money from this "fiat wallet" is also a chore hidden behind a shady process. Turns out you also need to DEPOSIT money into this Fiat Wallet for it to be able to withdrawl on first use. S9 not only haveI already deposited money so you know where it came from, you make me do it AGAIN. On top of that, I deposited the min allowed to get it going ($20) and THEN found out you cannot withdrawl unless you are withdrawing at least $100. So I needed to deposit even more money to take it all back (with a fee of course).While Crypto functions may work, the business practices of the company in these examples was enough for me not to trust this company. Add to that it took weeks of back and forth just to get my 'fiat wallet' issue looked at, stay clear.

Old account locked after changing country of residence. Nothing works to restore access. Customer support answers emails formally, not caring at all, without giving any real attention and providing useless suggestions. Chat support does not exist.Registering new account seems to be impossible too. Silly authorisation mistakes upon log-in. No suggestions from their comments at Google Play, by email, or chat — have worked. I am amazed at the level of ineffectiveness and stupidity of the customer support in this company. I am giving up to restore access or re-register.

list_of_reviews.review_title: So I tried to pay a vendor $45 in…
list_of_reviews.review: So I tried to pay a vendor $45 in bitcoin. I opened an account at crypto.com and, after a couple of days of verification I finally got an account.  I deposited over $50 to cover costs and attempted to pay the vendor. I was informed that you cannot pay anything under $100 You can deposit under $100 but don't expect to do anything with itSo. I transferred the bitcoin back to cash, paying the fee and tried to withdraw.  Ahh, you cannot withdraw under $100.So, I deposited another $52 so that I had over $100 to withdraw which the company lost. I am now 2 weeks in and 7 separate support chats with  "special teams" to find my deposit.  I should mention that I have spent over 5 hours with this inept companyDo not use these guys !!!
Worst platform ever. Never seen such bullcrap in one platform. You can deposit money on app no problem really easy. When it comes to withdraw? Good luck if you're in Europe. YOU CAN'T. Trash app.

they blocked my account without any reason, I sent an email several times, but they replied just a template email that they would respond to you in some days, their chat support is the same, a robot with any help, they blocked an old account that you can not withdraw your money or transfer any fiat or crypto. and I wonder why there is no authority that we can make a legal complaint to them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: half of your issues are irrelevant
list_of_reviews.review: I've used this for almost a year now, and had no real issues.. both with using my crypto card (have had two different cards) and with sending funds to other wallets. im sure many of the issues mentioned here are real, and clearly they need to invest in (human) customer support- but details like network fees (just stick with Solana), gas fees, lockup times, the importance of correct chain choice between wallets - there are online tutorials, and prices are mentioned in the terms and other places online, it's not unique to cryptocom, it's not a scam, it's a business model. but some of you seem to be complaining about real scams, "first you call me and sell me this app, with too many adds and then you took my money" doesn't sound like the actual crypto.com. fees aren't scams, the one you just paid made some graph jump, that's pretty much the game. Research the difference between btc/eth/sol-chains before you pick one for juggling money. I would much rather pay a slightly higher fixed instaprice for coins and hold a month than to mettle around with "trade orders" in the other apps myself. i stick with .com and phantom mostly. i really like the design, even though the graphs seem warped (why is 2021 taking up so much space?) and I would really love a candle option... to the guy giving one star because he can't figure out google authenticator, proudly spamming them with 200 emails about it: how about just googling it? YouTube it. You can't "demand" a phonecall because you can't figure out 2way authentication, you're blocking CS to people with real issues. one star because it's not available in your country yet, that's great "one star because they ask for ID when I want to change my phone number, it's been days" relax, that's a good thing. an actual human is processing your document. it shouldn't be easy to change your phone number. it shouldn't be easy to just "withdraw all" without any documentation. ...clearly, there are real issues they need to figure out, plus some millions spent on customer support would help this app rocket past some competitors. For the rest of us, maybe they could launch a tutorial video with a mandatory pop-quiz before people are allowed to register, and thereby get more informed reviews and receive relevant frustrations only.. now press the motorcycle if you understand that we will sit on your first $50 for a month. Crypto.com is here to help you digitalize and hopefully grow your assets- consider figuring out how to spend your profits digitally instead of stressing about the time or costs for transferring tiny amounts back to old banks in random countries (with their own fees) on day 3. if u fear red, or fumble and panic, sell to USDC to "pause" it until you understand, instead of spamming the withdrawal button. the crypto visacard will connect to googlepay and most online servicesthe AI bot everyone hates could refer to a part.com partcommunity driven discord server for platonic technical questions. sorry this got super lengthy, best of luck the future is blockchained #8000

list_of_reviews.review_title: Incredibly Disappointed - 6 Months and Still No Refund
list_of_reviews.review: I am extremely unhappy with my experience as a customer of Crypto.com. Since December 2023, I have been trying to receive a refund for a transaction issue, and now, at the end of May 2024, my account is still frozen. The lack of communication and transparency from Crypto.com is unacceptable. I trusted this platform with my funds, and the way I have been treated is extremely disappointing. I would caution others to think twice before using Crypto.com, as my experience has been nothing short of a nightmare.

After well over a week working with customer service they offered to move the funds via wire transfer to my bank.  That was 5 days ago and the wire transfer has still not occurred.  I keep raising it to customer service and they keep telling me to be patient.  They are seizing my funds and not allowing me access to the funds and refuse to resolve the issue.   I wish someone would form a class action suit against them so that everyone who has been screwed by them can join it and get damages for illegally seizing funds and holding them in Crypto and refusing to release the funds back to the rightful owners

They take a huge chunk of your money or crypto in fees every time you make a transaction. They are designed to fleece money out of new crypto traders who don't realize how badly they are being exploited.  Their customer service is terrible. I have been trying to withdraw my crypto from this exchange for months and I don't get SMS confirmation codes from them, so I can't.

Crypto.com support useless and utter waste of time (not a first horrible experience with them in short time)... I got locked out of my Amazon account and was asked to provide my crypto.com card statement with my address and card number... It's been almost 3 days, and crypto.com support (wether via app or X) is unable to produce one. I also had to explain 4 times what is it I need. Still nothing. Something that should be easily available through the app is impossible to achieve in any way so far. You can get a transaction history as csv, which in my case is useless. Still their support was trying to push me there. 2 days back was the last time I heard from them. Thanking me for my patience and explaining they "don't have a timeline" to provide a card statement... Glad I didn't upgrade my card. It's good when it's working, you are on your own when it doesn't.

I would caution others to think twice before using Crypto.com, as my experience has been nothing short of a nightmare.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Must read. I should have read the reviews first
list_of_reviews.review: I should have read the reviews first. I deposited £100 on my account, I bought the open custody protocol coin, I was left with £95. I gave the benefit of the doubt, maybe there was a difference somewhere, maybe the depreciation of the coin, whatever. Days later I got tired of holding the coin so I just wanted to withdraw and do something else with my money. I must convert to BTC first, so I converted and they don't even show what fees they apply or how much you'd be left with after you convert. I just click convert and I just see £85 left. £10 loss. Unbelievable. I convert from BTC to GBP and I see £83 left. To withdraw it's a £1.90 fee. Absolute robbery I have no idea who uses this app for genuine trading.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Incredibly Disappointed - 6 Months and Still No Refund
list_of_reviews.review: I am extremely unhappy with my experience as a customer of Crypto.com. Over the past several months, I have transacted thousands of dollars through the Crypto.com app, paying significant fees in the process. Since December 2023, I have been trying to receive a refund for a transaction issue, and now, at the end of May 2024, my account is still frozen. Despite numerous attempts to contact customer support, I have not received any clear answers or timelines regarding when my account will be reviewed or when I can expect my refund. The lack of communication and transparency from Crypto.com is unacceptable. I trusted this platform with my funds, and the way I have been treated is extremely disappointing. I would caution others to think twice before using Crypto.com, as my experience has been nothing short of a nightmare.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I think yesterday I did not consider…
list_of_reviews.review: I think yesterday I did not consider all things.As far as knowing my money was secure. I could withdrawal anything anytime. Never a question in my mind. If u have problems sorry to hear that. I will never trade anywhere else. I would highly recommend. The fact that I got my money in 1 day has nothing to do with it. i will be back, top notch outfit😉😁

list_of_reviews.review_title: RATING IS A ZERO _Zero Customer Service and poor applications.
list_of_reviews.review: I have funds in Crypto.com and I have been unable to get them transferred to my bank. First their partner (Plaid) is supposed to send me a code to my email address which does not work.  Their customer service is close to nonexistent.  After well over a week working with customer service they offered to move the funds via wire transfer to my bank.  That was 5 days ago and the wire transfer has still not occurred.  I keep raising it to customer service and they keep telling me to be patient.  They are seizing my funds and not allowing me access to the funds and refuse to resolve the issue.   I wish someone would form a class action suit against them so that everyone who has been screwed by them can join it and get damages for illegally seizing funds and holding them in Crypto and refusing to release the funds back to the rightful owners

They take a huge chunk of your money or crypto in fees every time you make a transaction. They are designed to fleece money out of new crypto traders who don't realize how badly they are being exploited.  Their customer service is terrible. I have been trying to withdraw my crypto from this exchange for months and I don't get SMS confirmation codes from them, so I can't.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Been a customer for a few years
list_of_reviews.review: Been a customer for a few years, everything was fine, now i wanna change the country and phone number as i’m not living in the same country anymore and I’m speaking with them to fix this issue for 2 days!2 of the agents told me to open another account in the curent country and transfer everything and then close the old one, but obviously you can’t have 2 accounts with the same name.They are useless, nobody do anything

list_of_reviews.review_title: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS…
list_of_reviews.review: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS system to my fiat wallet which is supposed to be faster and I made sure I used the correct code to send it.  It says on the email it will take up to 3 working days. It shows up in my banking app as correct and money has been sent. 5 days later it is still not showing up in my fiat wallet. I contacted support who were absolutly useless and said I had to wait 7 days. There is also minimum withdrawles which is strange considering other exchanges have no min amounts. I will never use Crypto.com again, if I can ever get my money back from them.

I've been using this exchange for over 2 years and never had any issues with buying or selling on the main app, or with transferring to other exchanges/wallets.  I've had issues with my own bank not allowing transfers into my account, but that's not due to crypto.com.  I'm from the UK, so banks can be quite strict.  I've never used the defi app, so I can't comment on that.  I've also never had to contact customer support, so I can't comment on that either.The app can occasionally be slow, I've noticed that after some updates it has been a bit laggy, but at the moment there are no issues.  They offer a large range of tokens and a number of staking options.  The prices on here are higher than other exchanges as that's how they make their fees, unlike others that charge you a specific amount when you buy.Overall, I'm happy with the service and this exchange.  I also have their metal debit card, which I use all the time.
I have been on line with the customers support for a least the last six hour! They are useless and don’t want your business obviously!

Thought I'd transfer crypto from another wallet to my newly opened Crypto.com wallet. They provide you with a address to send it to but it doesn't arrive. When you query it with them they just tell you that they can't find it. Do yourself a favour, keep your hard earned money and try another exchange because these are charlatans. You've been warned

Attention! They blocked my account and stole all my money.I made a transfer to the UAB Transactive Systems account, my payment went through and was accepted, I bought USDT.Three weeks later, I received a letter that my account was blocked, and what reason they cannot tell me and that they take all my money for themselves without explaining the reason.I asked why, because I did not do anything illegal. They answer with a standard answer - we can't tell you, it's just that your account is blocked and we can't unblock it. You have lost your money for which we cannot tell you.

Turns out, crypto.com is actually quite good where Centralized Exchanges go.  I misunderstood something about deposits of FIAT currency, that ACH deposits, though you’re able to trade with the funds immediately, have to be settle, and that takes 5 - 7 business days. The fact that you can trade with those funds immediately is actually quite awesome.  Wire transfers take 1 - 2 days, and though you can’t trade with those funds, once they arrive, you can, and you can withdraw whatever crypto you buy with wired funds immediately.  This is TOTALLY understandable and OK.

Fee baiting, glitchy app, bounced around on customer service for more than 8 hours, slow and missing deposits. Halted withdraws, app crashes particularly when the market is volatile - doesn't execute trades when you want it to. It's been endless. Dont bother. Take your money off this platform, they can't be trusted to act ethically or to continue fixing all the issues with their app.
SCAM, they call you super Quick after you enter your email name and phone number. They urge you to do the steps and downlaod the app crypto.com. Just run… dont waste tour Time.SCAM SCAM SCAM!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This cex is so bad it can almost be…
list_of_reviews.review: This cex is so bad it can almost be called a scam. No cashback from visa card, hefty fees and no real customer service. I would not recommend anyone open an account here.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Theres something very dark going with…
list_of_reviews.review: Theres something very dark going with this wallet. Transactions never arrive when I actually need them to arrive. Dont use this if you use crypto to gamble. (Their DeFi wallet purposely doesnt send money in time, no idea how they are doing this) I wait 2 hours for transaction to have 1 confirmation. They are also partners of serie A. Looks very suspicious and corrupt

Poor customer service, I had an issue with a fraudulent charge on my card they took over 2 months to reply to me. Their phone number on the back card doesn’t work. It’s been 3 months since the said they sent a new card out, they said it takes 2 weeks, now they are saying there is no time frame on the matter

list_of_reviews.review_title: Stay away and check for help through…
list_of_reviews.review: Stay away and check for help through the name on my profile picture for help back.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trying too hard to be the smartest at users’ expense
list_of_reviews.review: Some really good stuff (like their icy white credit card working beautifully). But they are not transparent enough on their pricing. You will find pages of tariffs (for regulatory compliance) but their customer service is not willing to tell you whether it is better for you to trade on Exchange and then transfer to cryptocom, how to trade at cheapest cost nor what their usual spreads are when trading any specific crypto (watch surprises there!). Feels like they are trying too hard to be the smartest at the expense of being just the best/easiest/cheapest platform that customers want. Less is more. Really smart platforms make it super easy, transparent, fast and cost competitive to their customers.

Tried withdrawing funds on many occasions and kept says undergoing maintenance, BS is what it was, you get onto customer support and they try everything to avoid your issue. They close chats before you are even finished texting. Absolute joke they are, don't go through the same thing I did. They took years off me👎😮‍💨

list_of_reviews.review_title: I don't understand why the people are…
list_of_reviews.review: I don't understand why the people are so dumb.One star - because app take spreads.. (use exchange not app, idi*ots. If you don't know what is a spread- reading in google)One star- because you dont know how manage 2FA.. really?One star- because you need send ID. I cant belive.One star- because you not able transfer your money to your bank? so better if your bank will block your account? great! I never had issue with crypto.com, Is a best exchange which have a Financial Conduct Authority.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have to write another review
list_of_reviews.review: I have to write another review. They should just dissolve as a company! I can’t transfer from my crypto card back to my fiat wallet?!!!!! UTTER USELESSNESS and they do nothing about it. Almost 8k reviews about their terrible operation and customer service yet they’re doing nothing about it

Absolutely pathetic customer service.  Once they have your money they don't care.  Try and make a withdrawal, and they make it as difficult as possible.  Try to get some customer service support and you will spend eternity texting trying to get a resolution.  Don't even bother.  Worst experience ever.  Buyer beware.
This app is a joke. I tried to register with multiple valid ID’s however they have denied my application without any explanation. The customer service is appalling.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Must read. I should have read the reviews first
list_of_reviews.review: I should have read the reviews first. I deposited £100 on my account, I bought the open custody protocol coin, I was left with £95. I gave the benefit of the doubt, maybe there was a difference somewhere, maybe the depreciation of the coin, whatever. Days later I got tired of holding the coin so I just wanted to withdraw and do something else with my money. I must convert to BTC first, so I converted and they don't even show what fees they apply or how much you'd be left with after you convert. I just click convert and I just see £85 left. £10 loss. Unbelievable. I convert from BTC to GBP and I see £83 left. To withdraw it's a £1.90 fee. Absolute robbery I have no idea who uses this app for genuine trading.

prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews emphasize transparency, compliance, and legitimate business strategies. Conversely, negative reviews criticize the frequent use of repetitive call-to-action phrases and multiple links, which many perceive as indicative of bot-generated content, leading to concerns over impersonal and automated interactions. They say the fee is 0.0006 bitcoin but anyone who doesn't know this looks like maybe a quid or something but it turns out it's £35. My recipient only received £85 from the £120 I sent. Absolute criminals. Avoid this company they are robbing bees

Absolute jokeEnticed clients, initially, with the ability to receive the cost of Spotify in CRO...which then was removed.If having money in their card and not using the card for 1 month, guess what, 5£ fee for "inactivity". Unable to send the money from my card to the crypto account (so basically "locked" for card use only. Unable to withdraw funds from crypto.com main account as they could not tell how I transferred funds to the account in the first place (??). Finally had to send more money into the crypto account in order to withdraw, guess what- 2.5£ charge for removing money. If you want to deal with crypto and stay away from fees, might as well open a revolut account. Saves you the hassle of this shady company and definitely avoid a minefield of hidden fees.Account closed!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS…
list_of_reviews.review: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS system to my fiat wallet which is supposed to be faster and I made sure I used the correct code to send it.  It says on the email it will take up to 3 working days. It shows up in my banking app as correct and money has been sent. 5 days later it is still not showing up in my fiat wallet. I contacted support who were absolutly useless and said I had to wait 7 days. There is also minimum withdrawles which is strange considering other exchanges have no min amounts. I will never use Crypto.com again, if I can ever get my money back from them.

Turns out, crypto.com is actually quite good where Centralized Exchanges go.  I misunderstood something about deposits of FIAT currency, that ACH deposits, though you’re able to trade with the funds immediately, have to be settle, and that takes 5 - 7 business days. The fact that you can trade with those funds immediately is actually quite awesome.  Wire transfers take 1 - 2 days, and though you can’t trade with those funds, once they arrive, you can, and you can withdraw whatever crypto you buy with wired funds immediately.  This is TOTALLY understandable and OK.

Thought I'd transfer crypto from another wallet to my newly opened Crypto.com wallet. They provide you with a address to send it to but it doesn't arrive. When you query it with them they just tell you that they can't find it. Do yourself a favour, keep your hard earned money and try another exchange because these are charlatans. You've been warned

Fee baiting, glitchy app, bounced around on customer service for more than 8 hours, slow and missing deposits. Halted withdraws, app crashes particularly when the market is volatile - doesn't execute trades when you want it to. It's been endless. Dont bother. Take your money off this platform, they can't be trusted to act ethically or to continue fixing all the issues with their app.

Attention! They blocked my account and stole all my money.I made a transfer to the UAB Transactive Systems account, my payment went through and was accepted, I bought USDT.Three weeks later, I received a letter that my account was blocked, and what reason they cannot tell me and that they take all my money for themselves without explaining the reason.I asked why, because I did not do anything illegal. They answer with a standard answer - we can't tell you, it's just that your account is blocked and we can't unblock it. You have lost your money for which we cannot tell you.
I have been on line with the customers support for a least the last six hour! They are useless and don’t want your business obviously!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trying too hard to be the smartest at users’ expense
list_of_reviews.review: Some really good stuff (like their icy white credit card working beautifully). But they are not transparent enough on their pricing. You will find pages of tariffs (for regulatory compliance) but their customer service is not willing to tell you whether it is better for you to trade on Exchange and then transfer to cryptocom, how to trade at cheapest cost nor what their usual spreads are when trading any specific crypto (watch surprises there!). Feels like they are trying too hard to be the smartest at the expense of being just the best/easiest/cheapest platform that customers want. Less is more. Really smart platforms make it super easy, transparent, fast and cost competitive to their customers.

(Their DeFi wallet purposely doesnt send money in time, no idea how they are doing this) I wait 2 hours for transaction to have 1 confirmation. They are also partners of serie A. Looks very suspicious and corrupt
I have been on line with the customers support for a least the last six hour! They are useless and don’t want your business obviously!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trying too hard to be the smartest at users’ expense
list_of_reviews.review: Some really good stuff (like their icy white credit card working beautifully). But they are not transparent enough on their pricing. You will find pages of tariffs (for regulatory compliance) but their customer service is not willing to tell you whether it is better for you to trade on Exchange and then transfer to cryptocom, how to trade at cheapest cost nor what their usual spreads are when trading any specific crypto (watch surprises there!). Feels like they are trying too hard to be the smartest at the expense of being just the best/easiest/cheapest platform that customers want. Less is more. Really smart platforms make it super easy, transparent, fast and cost competitive to their customers.

Tried withdrawing funds on many occasions and kept says undergoing maintenance, BS is what it was, you get onto customer support and they try everything to avoid your issue. They close chats before you are even finished texting. Absolute joke they are, don't go through the same thing I did. They took years off me👎😮‍💨

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for crypto.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases include "ease of use," "smooth transactions," "low fees," "support scams," "unprofessional practices," and "poor user satisfaction." These indicate common praise for transaction efficiency and cost, and concerns about security, professionalism, and user support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 2.17, calculated from six reviews (5, 1, 4, 1, 1, 1). The distribution shows one highly positive, one moderately positive, and four highly negative reviews, indicating generally low user satisfaction.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Summary: Users appreciate the platform's ease of use, smooth transactions, and low fees, but are concerned about support scams, unprofessional practices, and overall poor satisfaction, as reflected in the low average rating.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight ease of use, smooth transactions, and low fees, while negative reviews focus on support scams, unprofessional practices, and poor user satisfaction. Key differentiators are transaction efficiency and cost versus concerns about security and professionalism.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the crypto.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Customer support interactions are predominantly negative, highlighting unresponsiveness and ineffective problem resolution, with only one positive mention. The majority of reviews suggest the crypto.com support team is generally perceived as ineffective and unresponsive.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a mixed user experience, with positive feedback highlighting the platform's ease of use, smooth transactions, and low fees. However, significant concerns are raised about support scams, unprofessional practices, and overall poor user satisfaction, which are reflected in the low average rating. The key differentiators for the platform are its transaction efficiency and cost-effectiveness, but these are overshadowed by security and professionalism issues. The reviews appear genuine and informative, focusing on regulatory compliance and lacking signs of manipulation or cryptocurrency schemes. To improve, the platform should address security concerns, enhance customer support professionalism, and investigate the root causes of user dissatisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review: Horrendous customer service. I wasn't a big spender and was atrocious at resolving any issues on their application. If I had more money involved would be absolutely fuming with how they handle issues. Avoid at all costs and use other platforms.
Horrible customer service, been following up on an issue for the longest time but looks like nobody is really into it. Until now, not yet resolved

Scam scam scam. I put more than $5000 and I made some money for the first 5 weeks but this morning I woke up to find all my funds are gone and now I have $0. Don't lose your money and stay away from crypto.com and it's app.I contacted customer service and they literally did nothing. And no phone number to contact anyone. I went to the police station and they said they can do nothing and advised me to file a fraud complaint online. Total scam total bad luck.

Fraudsters!!! Beware! Avoid at all costs! They charge extortionate fees and stop you from transferring tokens to reputable exchanges! Terrible customer service...in fact it just doesn't exist! Absolute scammers!

Absolutely terrible app. Buggy, glitches, example when crob fell from 0.0024 to 0.17, wgen it gone back up my money has stayed at 0.0017, 30% down and as it's dropping its still eating at my money.  Customer services may as well not exist and I just want it fix.
Horrible thieves, fheir up down options are designed to steal from you and they coincidentally glitch anytime you may profit

list_of_reviews.review_title: I had an issue with a crypto deposit…
list_of_reviews.review: I had an issue with a crypto deposit that was resolved swiftly, thanks.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Been a customer for a few years
list_of_reviews.review: Been a customer for a few years, everything was fine, now i wanna change the country and phone number as i’m not living in the same country anymore and I’m speaking with them to fix this issue for 2 days!2 of the agents told me to open another account in the curent country and transfer everything and then close the old one, but obviously you can’t have 2 accounts with the same name.They are useless, nobody do anything

list_of_reviews.review_title: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS…
list_of_reviews.review: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS system to my fiat wallet which is supposed to be faster and I made sure I used the correct code to send it.  It says on the email it will take up to 3 working days. It shows up in my banking app as correct and money has been sent. 5 days later it is still not showing up in my fiat wallet. I contacted support who were absolutly useless and said I had to wait 7 days. There is also minimum withdrawles which is strange considering other exchanges have no min amounts. I will never use Crypto.com again, if I can ever get my money back from them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Just got charged £35 fee to send…
list_of_reviews.review: Just got charged £35 fee to send someone £120. They say the fee is 0.0006 bitcoin but anyone who doesn't know this looks like maybe a quid or something but it turns out it's £35. My recipient only received £85 from the £120 I sent. Absolute criminals. Avoid this company they are robbing bees

Absolute jokeEnticed clients, initially, with the ability to receive the cost of Spotify in CRO...which then was removed.If having money in their card and not using the card for 1 month, guess what, 5£ fee for "inactivity". Unable to send the money from my card to the crypto account (so basically "locked" for card use only. Unable to withdraw funds from crypto.com main account as they could not tell how I transferred funds to the account in the first place (??). Finally had to send more money into the crypto account in order to withdraw, guess what- 2.5£ charge for removing money. If you want to deal with crypto and stay away from fees, might as well open a revolut account. Saves you the hassle of this shady company and definitely avoid a minefield of hidden fees.Account closed!

list_of_reviews.review_title: This site is not scam is just very hard to use it .
list_of_reviews.review: Investment is fine in crypto.com the only issue is a bit hard to use the site that’s when all ppl think wrong ,I had issue for withdrawal and contacted the customer service took 1 day the support team helped me to withdraw my money with blink of eye .please ignore the all this bad review and contact the support team and your problem will be solved. when I saw all this bad reviews I panicked but then when i contacted the customer service live chat they help me and now know how to use the site with no issue .this is my honest review about crypto.com .All the best Serena .
Their personal support "specialist" chat/website doesn't work, just shows a blank white screen.

Fee baiting, glitchy app, bounced around on customer service for more than 8 hours, slow and missing deposits. Halted withdraws, app crashes particularly when the market is volatile - doesn't execute trades when you want it to. It's been endless. Dont bother. Take your money off this platform, they can't be trusted to act ethically or to continue fixing all the issues with their app.

Thought I'd transfer crypto from another wallet to my newly opened Crypto.com wallet. They provide you with a address to send it to but it doesn't arrive. When you query it with them they just tell you that they can't find it. Do yourself a favour, keep your hard earned money and try another exchange because these are charlatans. You've been warned

Attention! They blocked my account and stole all my money.I made a transfer to the UAB Transactive Systems account, my payment went through and was accepted, I bought USDT.Three weeks later, I received a letter that my account was blocked, and what reason they cannot tell me and that they take all my money for themselves without explaining the reason.I asked why, because I did not do anything illegal. They answer with a standard answer - we can't tell you, it's just that your account is blocked and we can't unblock it. You have lost your money for which we cannot tell you.

I misunderstood something about deposits of FIAT currency, that ACH deposits, though you’re able to trade with the funds immediately, have to be settle, and that takes 5 - 7 business days. list_of_reviews.review_title: Theres something very dark going with…

Attention! list_of_reviews.review_title: Great company, been using them for 5 years now
list_of_reviews.review: Don't listen to bad reviews when these are mainly people who have lost money not knowing what they were investing in.. This is a great company, been using them for 5 years now. As a private member, the customer service i receive is fairly instant and they have always resolved any issues I've faced.Couldn't ask for more, and now they are admitted to WEF, the sky is the limit!They making buying/selling crypto so simple and easy, yes theres spread and some fees but I believe you only care about spread/fees when you're an experienced trader. For any beginners/new people to crypto, this company and their app does it all!

This is a complete scam. Do not give this company your money. I registered and set up my account. To set up an account is not to difficult. Very easy to deposit money to crypto.com but very difficult to withdraw back to bank account. For me to transfer to  other crypto wallets it asks me for a 2fa code which I don't have or can remember creating. If you cant remember this then you cant touch your money or withdraw it.  I was fortunate to only deposit £50. I tried emailing them and never heard anything back

At this point, I believe that a formal complaint to the SEC is in order, since there isn't anything resembling customer service. Do yourself a favor, stay away from this app.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I wish there was a zero star
list_of_reviews.review: I wish there was a zero star I operated an account with Crypto.com for a long time and the service was good, however my email used was changed and I no longer receive messages. As a result I cannot access my account. I have reached out several times and have been sent round in circle. THE ISSUE IS I CANNOT ACCESS THE ACCOUNT. I was informed by email that the email address was changed but when I tried to log in I am getting the sign up page.I am very frustrated with the customer service provided as no regard is given to customers who have their funds stuck in the exchange.I hope I can get some action via this medium.

list_of_reviews.review_title: You can put money in but You might not get it back.100 k dissapeared from my account. You are not protected !
list_of_reviews.review: You can put money in but you might not get it back. 100 k gone from my account. That is it just gone. Crypto. Com response  "too bad"

Just trash, on all tokens I got charged 15% for selling, I lost a lot of money, plus some of my transaction was lost with correct address, I even have receipts and they want to charge me up to 150 dollars to retrieve it, I only have 280 dollars there, so after all the fees and recovery I got nothing left, initially I bought not token for 750 dollars, but the price dropt so I had 400 left I thought to transfer it so I don't have to pay enormous fees, then I had to transfer it back because of missing memo, I paid binance 60 cent to fix it, so they sent it back to crypto.com and I got a receipt, but crypto.com managed to loose it and now they asked me up to 150 dollars to get it on my wallet. Stay away, I'm cashing out

list_of_reviews.review_title: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS…

Turns out, crypto.com is actually quite good where Centralized Exchanges go.  I misunderstood something about deposits of FIAT currency, that ACH deposits, though you’re able to trade with the funds immediately, have to be settle, and that takes 5 - 7 business days. The fact that you can trade with those funds immediately is actually quite awesome.  Wire transfers take 1 - 2 days, and though you can’t trade with those funds, once they arrive, you can, and you can withdraw whatever crypto you buy with wired funds immediately.  This is TOTALLY understandable and OK.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The worst customer support i ever use

list_of_reviews.review_title: Honestly I’ve never dealt with a…
list_of_reviews.review: Honestly I’ve never dealt with a company this bad. The app asked me to verify my details…uploaded my bank statement (or a picture of it cause their systems wouldn’t let you upload a pdf). Rejected 3 times then account blocked now they are still happy to continue to take deposits not an issue but now I can’t withdraw. Get onto support so upload my driving licence and a biometric video. Then back to the app and upload me driving licence again. Recieve an email saying not acceptable. Decide to just close my account because I’ve not had this trouble with any other provider. I am then told can’t withdraw would have to transfer. Support then advise I should be able to withdraw and send me instructions. No joy so back to support to be advised that I can transfer to another wallet or forfeit the money. Decide to transfer (I’m a complete novice) to then realise I’ve been charged half of my balance to transfer to another wallet. Checked with the other wallet the fees are a quarter of what crypto are charging. Back to support I go…oh y can you send me your id I was like please no not this again! Anyway I question the fees and ask for an email to raise a complaint. They refused and said they don’t have any complaint and they will raise the issue and if I had a bank statement to send them. I refused because quite frankly I’m concerned now that’s these cowboys have got all my ID and it’s clearly not a reputable company. If you made it this far well done…my advice steer well clear of this company! I’ve used eToro for example and not a single issue quick withdrawal no issues verifications easy. I’m sure others will be much better too. Crypto.com seem like a bunch of chancers
Very bad service! They ignore if you are customer or not. They are only trying to do things complex, in order to need their help and apply high fees for doing nothing.

Horrible platform, so many hidden fees. Somehow I managed to lose around 12% just from the buying side. Transferred crypto out to external wallet and was just happy to get it back without too much of a loss. Avoid avoid avoid.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Transferring ADA from Defy Wallet to…
list_of_reviews.review: Transferring ADA from Defy Wallet to Crypto App...Ada's were deducted fro. Defy wallet but never arrived at Crypto App account. After asking the help desk were my Ada's were, They said my Ada's are on Hold. If I wa t them back I need to pay 150 Usd. But I day later they offered to do it for 100 Usd. Why do they let you make a transfer, then they put it on hold, without reason, and then they will ask you to pay 150 Usd for a "retrieval" because it is so called complicated. Well it's not that complicated as I was told by a service agent from Binance. This is already the second time this is happening. My first transfer went through without problems,  but the seco d transfer is just costing more money. Customer support take very long....And discussion the issue via email is a complete charade. Crypto.com isn't even capable of discussing the issue at hand, they only refer to their advise and how good it, is but issue of Ada's not arriving is not discussed, only to pay money. This is pure racketeering and scamming people,  please stay away from Crypto.com.
There’s soo much hidden costs, it will show higher price when you’re holding then when you try to sell the price goes down by 10-20% which is just awful

Even after showing them that the funds were deposited into their account, providing them with the bank statement, and reference number to the transfer they are still not depositing the funds. The transfer was done correctly added my ID in the transfer so they would know what account it was coming from amd.which account it should be going to.No excuses!!! Beware of this app it seems to have been hacked.I even tried sending them an email and get this none of my emails can be verified. I have screen shots o showed then nothing. Half the time I can't even upload them because their chat attachment button doesn't work.
