list_of_reviews.review_title: Usually dont write reviews but i had to…
list_of_reviews.review: Usually dont write reviews but i had to with this one. To keep is short and simple, they will scam you out of up to 50% when you withdraw. A few weeks ago, i withdrew $100 worth of bitcoin. Upon checking the confirmation, i realized they took $56 out of my $100 withdrawal. Over 50% was taken out of my already small withdrawal, and i cannot imagine what the “taxes and fees” would be if it were $1000 or more. Just for reference, i just made a $200 withdrawal on coinbase not even a month later, and the total taxes and fees did not even add up to $1. I withdrew literally double and paid 50 times less. Their math simply makes no reasonable sense and at this point it could not be more blatant. They are scamming and not even hiding it anymore. Please at least try other trusted sites, this one will 100% steal from you. (P.S. - the customer service is next to nothing)

Avoid at all costs, was randomly logged out and their platform fail to send me a login email and therefore i cannot access my funds. Their support is beyond useless and dont understand English and ignore anything said - been waiting for ages and they are still 'looking into it' - useless platform, useless support. Avoid and use a reputable platform like Coinbase etc that has decent Support that will reply.Will be reporting them to the FCA since due to their own platform faults they are disallowing me access to my own funds.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I congratulate those that have not…
list_of_reviews.review: I congratulate those that have not fallen into their trap already because everything seems so very easy from the star, the account creation, deposits process but get very complicated at the withdrawal stage.I am of the opinion that you watch out well before setting up here. As for me, I moved to To,Mver already where i enjoy esy withdrawal process

Haw Crypto.com still In business?You cant use you crypto when you want. If you have multiple wallets you need wait 24h any time you want add one. Impossible reach out with customer service.  Half future on platform not even working. They try so hard keep all your money locked worst then banks.  Terrible...

list_of_reviews.review_title: Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS…
list_of_reviews.review: (Edit) After contacing support a few times they did eventually sort out my problem..Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS system to my fiat wallet which is supposed to be faster and I made sure I used the correct code to send it.  It says on the email it will take up to 3 working days. It shows up in my banking app as correct and money has been sent. 5 days later it is still not showing up in my fiat wallet.

Turns out, crypto.com is actually quite good where Centralized Exchanges go.  I misunderstood something about deposits of FIAT currency, that ACH deposits, though you’re able to trade with the funds immediately, have to be settle, and that takes 5 - 7 business days. The fact that you can trade with those funds immediately is actually quite awesome.  Wire transfers take 1 - 2 days, and though you can’t trade with those funds, once they arrive, you can, and you can withdraw whatever crypto you buy with wired funds immediately.  This is TOTALLY understandable and OK.

I do really wish the govt can come to our aid before this app take people to early grave, it’s so unfortunate that iPhone doesn’t verify the type of app they also make people download, it’s fraudulent, everything about this app is fraud, My $1050 has been pending for over 15days and they told me it’ll be available in 7business days, I coulda known better, this is 2024, I made transaction with the strike options, everytime my prediction was right, the app would say an error occurred and told me I went into a loss, I’m pained, Im pissed, they are thieves and need to be brought to justice.I had a pending transaction, but can't withdraw the available balance in my fiat wallet, I'm just hurt that this sh#t is happening, Invested over $1050 and cant trade with nothing despite all the verifications I did, the customer help would say they dont have any info on any technical difficulty but would assist you when you are about the deposit into the scam app but your money is always stuck in the app. I would definitely give a 0 star or a negative if I could.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This site is not scam is just very hard to use it .
list_of_reviews.review: Investment is fine in crypto.com the only issue is a bit hard to use the site that’s when all ppl think wrong ,I had issue for withdrawal and contacted the customer service took 1 day the support team helped me to withdraw my money with blink of eye .please ignore the all this bad review and contact the support team and your problem will be solved. when I saw all this bad reviews I panicked but then when i contacted the customer service live chat they help me and now know how to use the site with no issue .this is my honest review about crypto.com .All the best Serena .

list_of_reviews.review_title: Usually dont write reviews but i had to…
list_of_reviews.review: Usually dont write reviews but i had to with this one. To keep is short and simple, they will scam you out of up to 50% when you withdraw. A few weeks ago, i withdrew $100 worth of bitcoin. Upon checking the confirmation, i realized they took $56 out of my $100 withdrawal. Over 50% was taken out of my already small withdrawal, and i cannot imagine what the “taxes and fees” would be if it were $1000 or more. Just for reference, i just made a $200 withdrawal on coinbase not even a month later, and the total taxes and fees did not even add up to $1. I withdrew literally double and paid 50 times less. Their math simply makes no reasonable sense and at this point it could not be more blatant. They are scamming and not even hiding it anymore. Please at least try other trusted sites, this one will 100% steal from you. (P.S. - the customer service is next to nothing)

Avoid and use a reputable platform like Coinbase etc that has decent Support that will reply.Will be reporting them to the FCA since due to their own platform faults they are disallowing me access to my own funds.

This is TOTALLY understandable and OK.

Anyway I question the fees and ask for an email to raise a complaint. They refused and said they don’t have any complaint and they will raise the issue and if I had a bank statement to send them. I refused because quite frankly I’m concerned now that’s these cowboys have got all my ID and it’s clearly not a reputable company. If you made it this far well done…my advice steer well clear of this company! I’ve used eToro for example and not a single issue quick withdrawal no issues verifications easy. I‘ve been using Crypto.com since 2020 and I‘ve had no issues until I got locked out of my account because I was trying to log in from a different country. I contacted their customer support to try and get the issue resolved. I got connected to one of their „Specialists“ who are NOT specialists at all. They first said it was a problem with the one time password (I don’t have one time password active) but I went along anyway since I thought the must know. It took them TREE days to deactivate the OTP and it didn’t fix the issue. They then said it was cause I wasn’t using the passkey feature on IOS I did that and it still didn’t work. I then sent them another screen recording of the error and they then said it was cause I was using an outdated email link to verify my login (I wasn’t). At this point it has been FIVE DAYS since I contacted their support. I gave up at this point. I‘m switching to a different exchange and I don’t recommend anyone uses Crypto.com. Its great until you have an issue and their customer support won’t help you in any way. They will just throw random reasons at you as to why something doesn’t work but these supposed „Specialists“ have absolutely no idea, some of them can’t even type a sentence without grammatical errors. Laughable.

list_of_reviews.review_title: If I could give this company zero…
list_of_reviews.review: If I could give this company zero stars, I would. They have ruined my bank account, ruined my credit, and put fraudulent transactions on my debit card in the amount of over $1,500. I contacted them multiple times via email and their online chat support and spoke to 10 different agents who couldn't provide me with any answers and only lied to me. One agent told me to "hold on a moment please" and then returned to the conversation 8 hours later, leaving me waiting the entire time. I also finally got so frustrated and upset that I wrote a letter to the CEO and he ignored my pleas for help, too. This company cannot be trusted.

Turns out, crypto.com is actually quite good where Centralized Exchanges go.  I misunderstood something about deposits of FIAT currency, that ACH deposits, though you’re able to trade with the funds immediately, have to be settle, and that takes 5 - 7 business days. The fact that you can trade with those funds immediately is actually quite awesome.  Wire transfers take 1 - 2 days, and though you can’t trade with those funds, once they arrive, you can, and you can withdraw whatever crypto you buy with wired funds immediately.  This is TOTALLY understandable and OK.

list_of_reviews.review: (Edit) After contacing support a few times they did eventually sort out my problem..Sent a fiat deposit using the FPS system to my fiat wallet which is supposed to be faster and I made sure I used the correct code to send it.  It says on the email it will take up to 3 working days. It shows up in my banking app as correct and money has been sent. 5 days later it is still not showing up in my fiat wallet.
